---
title: "About Prof Huster"
---

I graduated with a B. A. in physics from the University of California, 
Santa Barbara. I completed an M. S. and Ph. D. in physics from the 
University of Pennsylvania.

I worked in industry for over a decade, mostly doing research and 
development in ocean acoustics. 

I have over twenty years of college and university level teaching at 
Simpson University in Redding CA, Nyack College, NY and 
Duquesne University in Pittsburgh, PA.
